Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a post in the campus social circle.

authorId.description: ID of the user who created the post.

authorName.description: Name of the user who created the post.

authorAvatarId.description: Avatar ID of the user who created the post.

authorImageBase64.description: Base64 encoded string of the user's custom avatar at the time of posting.

content.description: The text content of the post.

imageBase64.description: Base64 encoded string of the image attached to the post.

likeIds.description: Array of user IDs who liked the post.

commentCount.description: The number of comments on the post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the post was created.

UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

displayName_lowercase.description: The user's display name in lowercase for searching.

avatarId.description: The ID for the user's default avatar image from the placeholder list.

avatarUrl.description: URL of the user's custom uploaded avatar.

bio.description: A short bio or signature for the user.

imageBase64.description: Base64 encoded string of the user's avatar.

friendIds.description: List of user IDs that are friends with this user.

friendRequestsSent.description: List of friend requests sent by this user.

userId.description: The ID of the user to whom the request was sent.

message.description: The verification message sent with the request.

friendRequestsReceived.description: List of friend requests received by this user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who sent the request.

message.description: The verification message received with the request.

lastActive.description: Timestamp of the user's last activity.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Represents a comment on a post.

postId.description: ID of the post to which the comment belongs.

authorId.description: ID of the user who created the comment.

authorName.description: Name of the user who created the comment.

authorAvatarId.description: Avatar ID of the user who created the comment.

authorImageBase64.description: Base64 encoded string of the user's custom avatar at the time of commenting.

content.description: The text content of the comment.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the comment was created.

WallMessage.title: Wall Message
WallMessage.description: Represents a public message on the community wall.

content.description: The text content of the message.

authorId.description: ID of the user who posted the message.

authorName.description: Name of the user who posted the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the message was posted.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a private chat session between two or more users.

participantIds.description: Array of user IDs participating in the chat.

participantInfo.description: Map of participant user IDs to their profile info for easy display.

ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat.

content.description: The text content of the message. Optional if an image is sent.

imageBase64.description: Base64 encoded string of the image being sent. Optional.

/posts/{postId}.description: Holds all the posts created by users in the social circle.

/posts/{postId}/comments/{commentId}.description: Holds all comments associated with a specific post. Admin can delete any comment.

/users/{userId}.description: Holds public profile information for each user.

/wallMessages/{messageId}.description: Holds all public messages on the community wall.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Holds metadata for each private chat session.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Subcollection holding all messages for a specific chat.
